DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate generic emtricitabine ( FTC ) efficacy safety Chinese naive pregnant HBsAg positive patient prevention HBV vertical transmission . Single group patient enrol receive emtricitabine till 24 week delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Emtricitabine Prevention Vertical Transmission HBV Chinese Pregnant HBsAg Positive Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Single group patient enrol receive emtricitabine till 24 week delivery , include HBeAg positive patient . Patients newborns follow till 48 week delivery evaluate efficacy prevention vertical transmission .
